sections.general: director of information technology professional summary dynamic information technology manager with 13 years of it leadership experience including oversight of infrastructure, application support and cybersecurity services. dedicated to customer satisfaction with focused delivery of technical solutions. proven leader in directing operations, maintenance and support of complex systems. develops creative business solutions, leveraging diverse methodologies and delivering engineering solutions for leading organizations. highly adept in request for proposal development, technology needs assessments and staff training. successful in motivating teams to meet demanding timelines by utilizing critical thinking, resource and conflict management and facilitating stakeholder engagement. innovative and driven with passion for delivering forward thinking, emerging trend technologies.
